Docs.summary: Defines necessary facilities for an object that intends to behave as an input language source.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Implement this interface on a class that intends to behave as an input language source.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager.RegisterInputLanguageSource%2A> method to register an input language source with an <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputLanguageManager>.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the current input language for this input language source object.
Docs.value: A object representing the current input language for this input language source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When implemented by a class, this property should provide facilities for setting a new current input language on the input language source object, and for retrieving the currently active input language from the input language source object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes an input language source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When implemented by a class, this method should perform any initialization actions that are necessary for the object to behave as an active input language source.

Docs.summary: Gets a list of input languages supported by this input language source object.
Docs.value: An enumerable object that represents the list of input languages supported by this input language source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When implemented by a class, this property should return an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, and that supports enumerating a collection of <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> objects, each representing a supported input language.

Docs.summary: Un-initializes an input language source object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When implemented by a class, this method should perform any relevant cleanup actions prior to the class being discarded as an active input language source.
